definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great

sentences.english: 1930 - The planet Pluto is officially named.
sentences.chinese: 1930年的今天，冥王星被正式命名。

sentences.english: If Pluto was a planet, Eris obviously was too.
sentences.chinese: 如果冥王星是行星，厄里斯星就也该是。

sentences.english: Pluto has a moon, called Charon, which is about the size of Quaoar itself.
sentences.chinese: 冥王星有一颗卫星，叫卡戎，和夸欧尔差不多大。

sentences.english: Pluto is now considered a dwarf planet dwelling in the Kuiper belt.
sentences.chinese: 冥王星现在被认定为一颗处于柯伊伯带中的矮行星。

sentences.english: Composite Pluto in the seventh house can have two quite opposite effects.
sentences.chinese: 合图中，冥王星位于第七宫会产生两种很不同的影响。

sentences.english: Pluto's discovery was a stone with its waves.
sentences.chinese: 冥王星的发现一石激起千层浪。

sentences.english: And whereas Pluto has an atmosphere, Charon apparently does not.
sentences.chinese: 冥王星有大气层，冥卫一显然就没有。

sentences.english: This is either Nott or the Death Eater Luna Reducto-ed Pluto at.
sentences.chinese: 他是诺特或当面被卢娜击碎冥王星的食死徒。

sentences.english: The full moon will be conjunct Pluto, indicating quite a powerful force.
sentences.chinese: 这次的满月将会联合冥王星，展示充满的能量。

sentences.english: The Q is - do you mean Pluto in its aphelion or perihelion ?
sentences.chinese: 我的问题是，冥王星此时是在近地点还是远地点？

sentences.english: It is all because, compared with Neptune, Pluto is very small.
sentences.chinese: 冥王星与海卫一几乎同样大小，同样密度。

sentences.english: Pluto's orbit the Sun is 248 years.
sentences.chinese: 冥王星的轨道太阳是248年。

sentences.english: Pluto has family in the outer solar system.
sentences.chinese: 冥王星在太阳系外宇宙有着它自己的家族。

sentences.english: Tyson was one of the first to push for Pluto's demotion.
sentences.chinese: Tyson是率先提议将冥王星降级的科学家之一。

sentences.english: So what makes Pluto so different that it could be um'reclassify.
sentences.chinese: 是什么使冥王星如此不同以至于要被重新分类？

sentences.english: Now, new research indicates that Pluto may have suffered a similar fate.
sentences.chinese: 现在，新的研究表明，冥王星可能遭受了类似的命运。

definition: Vesta, an asteroid, second most massive object in the asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter, discovered in 1807 by H.W. Olbers
Sagittarius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter
Virgo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
